```{r display apoe status from the kuadrc cohort or bold study}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr params$kuadrc_apoe

if (params$kuadrc_apoe) {
  apoe <- BRIDGE21::get_database_values(ku_apoe1, ku_apoe2, data = data)
  apoeCarrierStatus <- sprintf("E%s/E%s", apoe[1], apoe[2])
} else if (params$bold_apoe) {
  apoe <- BRIDGE21::get_database_values(apoe, data = data)
  apoeCarrierStatus <- as.character(apoe)
}

if (all(!is.na(apoe)) & nrow(apoe) != 0) {
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto("sections/blood/latex/apoe.tex", type = "input")
  cat("\\textbf{YOUR APOE RESULT}: ", apoeCarrierStatus)
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")
}
```
